title: The Matt Levine Is Amazing Edition
description:
Matt Levine of Bloomberg View discusses three of his favorite stories from 2014 with host Felix Salmon of Fusion, Cathy O'Neil of mathbabe.org, and special guest Shane Ferro of Business Insider.
Show notes at slate.com/slatemoney

itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: Matt Levine of Bloomberg View joins the Slate Money crew and special guest Shane Ferro of Business Insider to discuss insider trading, bank earnings, and Argentina.
